title: feat: add BYOP and API Key Usage Grafana dashboards
author: ElliotEtag

gist.summary: Added new Grafana dashboards to track 'Bring Your Own Pollen' (BYOP) usage and individual API key consumption metrics.
gist.impact: Provides the operations team with better visibility into pollen consumption patterns and API key usage distribution.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee reviewing data on a retro computer monitor. The screen displays pixelated bar charts and line graphs representing pollen usage. The setting is a cozy, lo-fi control room.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee analyzing a glowing monitor with pixelated charts and graphs. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi office vibes. Text in pixel font: 'METRICS'. Nostalgic but beautiful.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee analyzing a glowing monitor with pixelated charts and graphs. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi office vibes. Text in pixel font: 'METRICS'. Nostalgic but beautiful.
